text:
Lots of lessons for healthcare leaders from sports and elite athletes

And who better to teach us these lessons than ⁦@DrMJoyner⁩

Covid-19 is not a marathon - STAT https://t.co/Lh6qrz5YFd

2/ Currently available COVID treatments:

Sotrovimab
Bebtelovimab 
Paxlovid
Remdesivir
Molnupivavir

1/ Another monoclonal antibody receives EUA for use in persons >|= 12 yrs with mild to moderate COVID

Bebtelovimab active against Omicron, given as IV infusion within 7 days of symptom onset

Not approved for post exposure prophylaxis 

https://t.co/mFlGjfoN5q
RT @EricTopol: American Covid deaths are finally in descent, after reaching 75% of the pandemic peak when there was no vaccine protection h…

Key COVID vaccines updates on Feb 11, 2022

No required waiting period after monoclonal antibodies

For immunocompromised pts  

- boosters at 3 months after primary mRNA series (instead of 5 mo)

-  additional dose of vaccine 28 days after J&J, followed by booster at 2 mo
